org.springframework.test.web.servlet.htmlunit.MockMvcWebClientBuilder

Packages that use MockMvcWebClientBuilder
Package
Description
org.springframework.test.web.servlet.htmlunit
Server-side support for testing Spring MVC applications with MockMvc and HtmlUnit.

  • Uses of MockMvcWebClientBuilder in org.springframework.test.web.servlet.htmlunit

    Subclasses with type arguments of type MockMvcWebClientBuilder in org.springframework.test.web.servlet.htmlunit
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    MockMvcWebClientBuilder
    MockMvcWebClientBuilder simplifies the creation of an HtmlUnit WebClient that delegates to a MockMvc instance.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static MockMvcWebClientBuilder
    MockMvcWebClientBuilder.mockMvcSetup(MockMvc mockMvc)
    Create a new MockMvcWebClientBuilder based on the supplied MockMvc instance.
    static MockMvcWebClientBuilder
    MockMvcWebClientBuilder.webAppContextSetup(WebApplicationContext context)
    Create a new MockMvcWebClientBuilder based on the supplied WebApplicationContext.
    static MockMvcWebClientBuilder
    MockMvcWebClientBuilder.webAppContextSetup(WebApplicationContext context, MockMvcConfigurer configurer)
    Create a new MockMvcWebClientBuilder based on the supplied WebApplicationContext and MockMvcConfigurer.
    MockMvcWebClientBuilder
    MockMvcWebClientBuilder.withDelegate(org.htmlunit.WebClient webClient)
    Supply the WebClient that the client built by this builder should delegate to when processing non-matching requests.
